page.title: 02PRESTON SCHOOL
page.content: Preston school is a small village school.The present building was erected in 1966 with additions in 1972 The school has a spacious hall and 3 classrooms catering for the age range 5-11.In addition there is a staff room office,kitchen,kiln room and cloakroom areas.Outside there is a very large grassed area and a hard playground also.The catchment area is wide.The children come from Preston,Langley, Ley Green,Kings Walden and occasion- ally Tea Green,Breachwood Green and Gosmore.The majority travel in on the school minibus.There are 46 children in the school.On the staff there are 3 teachers,a welfare assistant,secretary cook and general assistant,a dining room helper,cleaner-in-charge and assistant cleaner.
